title: My Fake Wife
overview: Tang Beibei marries Jiang Jingchen, the eldest son of the Jiang family, instead of her sister. He is rich and powerful, but he was paralyzed due to an accident. Because of this, Tang Beibei's half-sister, Rong Meier, did not want to marry him. However, after seeing Jingchen's true face without a mask, Meyer became interested in him and wanted to get him, starting to build insidious intrigues against Beibei.
